name: Dali
title: Dali - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Dali is a historic city in Yunnan Province, famous for its ancient town, Erhai Lake, and Cangshan Mountains. Known for its Bai ethnic minority culture, traditional architecture, and stunning natural scenery between mountains and lake. A popular destination for cultural tourism.

highlights.attractions: Dali Ancient Town, Three Pagodas, Erhai Lake, Cangshan Mountains
highlights.cuisine: Rushan Cheese, Xizhou Baba, Dali-style Hot Pot, Erhai Lake Fish
highlights.bestTime: Spring (March-May) and Autumn (September-November) with pleasant weather

dishes.name: Rushan Cheese
dishes.description: Traditional Bai ethnic minority cheese, often grilled and served with honey.

dishes.name: Xizhou Baba
dishes.description: Local flatbread specialty from Xizhou Town, crispy and flavorful.

dishes.name: Erhai Lake Fish
dishes.description: Fresh fish from Erhai Lake, prepared in traditional Bai style.

foodStreets.name: Dali Ancient Town Food Street
foodStreets.description: Traditional Bai cuisine and local specialties in the historic old town.

foodStreets.name: Xizhou Town
foodStreets.description: Famous for local snacks and traditional Bai ethnic minority cuisine.

gettingThere: By Air: Dali Airport (DLU) with domestic flights from major Chinese cities
By Train: High-speed rail connects Dali to Kunming and other Yunnan cities
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from Kunming and neighboring cities
gettingAround: Bicycle: Popular way to explore Erhai Lake and surrounding areas
Taxi: Available for short distances within the city
Bus: Local bus services to major attractions
Walking: Best way to explore Dali Ancient Town

activities: Morning: Explore Dali Ancient Town and its traditional Bai architecture
Afternoon: Visit Three Pagodas and Chongsheng Temple
Evening: Walk around the ancient town when it's beautifully lit
Morning: Take a cable car up Cangshan Mountains for hiking trails
Afternoon: Rent a bicycle and cycle around Erhai Lake
Evening: Enjoy local Bai cuisine in Xizhou Town
Morning: Visit local markets and experience Bai ethnic culture
Afternoon: Explore Xizhou Town and try local specialties
Evening: Relax by Erhai Lake and enjoy the sunset
